title: #451 Nirvana Is My Pearl Jam with Joe List
itunes:title: Nirvana Is My Pearl Jam with Joe List
description:
Joe List came over to argue with me about music. For real Joe is top 3 or 4 comics into music. He’s got great taste and he loves going to live shows even more than I do. And I really really love going to live shows. He does it sober all the time which is crazy to me, but that goes to show you how much he likes music. Legit though, all we really disagree on is whether Pearl Jam and Nirvana are great or just really good. 

The intro is a manic recounting of the last two concerts I went to. If you’re listening to this on Spotify or Apple Podcasts, put your phone on speaker and don’t look at it again till the music is done. 

Follow Joe:

Instagram

Twitter

03/06 | Salt Lake City 

The Music:

Pearl Jam - Last Kiss

Nirvana - Lake of Fire

John Mellencamp - Pink Houses

Billy Idol - White Wedding

LCD Soundsystem - Dance Yourself Clean

Thanks to our sponsors! Go to 3Chi.com and use code "Skeptic" at checkout for 5% off your order, and use code "Skeptic" at LiquidIV.com for 25% off your order!
